items.title: Strategy Consulting Bootcamp: Structure & Solve Any Problem

Apply the problem solving techniques used by top consulting firms such as McKinsey, BCG and Bain
Set-up a structured approach that paves the way for exceptional results in record time

visible_instructors.title: Skillay Academy
visible_instructors.name: Skillay

items.headline: Management Blueprint Series: Improve writing skills, write quality strategic plans, showcase results, save time
objectives_summary: Write a strategic plan in 2 - 3 days
How to write a strategic plan
How to prepare a strategic plan outline

items.title: A New Method For Product Development & Design: SIMPSIS-Model
items.headline: A Comprehensive Motivation Framework for Product Owners, Managers, (UX) Designers, and IT & SaaS Startup Entrepreneurs
objectives_summary: A new and revolutionary framework for product development & design backed by science that reveals the reasons why your customers buy, stay, and engage with your product.
Learn how motivation and behavior works with +7 important theories you must know about (Incl. motivation & behavioral psychology crash-course worth $99,99).
See 100+ practical case examples and 50+ techniques used by successful companies and why they work on a psychological level.

items.title: Mini MBA: Business Strategy 2 Business Plan
items.headline: Mini MBA & Business Plan: Business Plan Coaching to enhance Business Management & Business Writing
objectives_summary: Discover the Business Fundamentals of Business Strategy and the Business Plan and how the two inter-connect
Discover the main strategic analysis frameworks and discover how to complete a SWOT analysis
Be introduced to some of the key Business Models taught in Business School, providing a toolbox of frameworks to use when formulating Business Strategy

items.title: International Expansion: A Blueprint for Success
items.headline: An Action Plan to Profitably Expand Your Business Through International Sales and Partnerships
objectives_summary: After completing this course, you will be ready to profitably expand your business internationally!

Specifically, you will be able to analyze which markets to enter, determine the best ways to enter these markets, forecast the impact of global expansion on your overall business and understand what to do to keep your international business growing.

items.title: Scenario Planning for Your Post-COVID "New Normal"
items.headline: Use this technique to visualize your organization's post-pandemic landscape, and develop a strategic response
objectives_summary: How to visualize different ways your business terrain could develop - during and after the COVID19 crisis
How to foresee how the Coronavirus crisis will change the "big picture" for your company
How to identify specific opportunities and challenges you may encounter as the crisis goes on, and when it is over

items.title: Business Plan: Learn It Fast! - Business Planning & Writing
items.headline: In 1 Hour You Can Learn How To Write A Comprehensive Business Plan. Ideal for those who want to get started quickly!
objectives_summary: Structure Your Business Plan
Create A Plan With The Right Information
Persuade Yourself Of The Business' Viability

items.title: Get Clients: How To Get Coaching Or Consulting Clients
items.headline: Learn 6 Simple Steps You Can Take This Week to Help You Start Getting Clients
objectives_summary: Know exactly what type of clients you should be targeting
Know where to find your ideal clients
Know how to communicate what you do for your ideal clients so they want to work with you

items.title: Fiverr Freelancing 2021-Fiverr New Seller Crash Course Guide

Interact with the Fiverr Platform so you will be confident when you start selling on fiver
Learn How we Create Our First Gig
